snippet.title: Semrush: All-in-One Platform for Businesses
snippet.subtitle: Step into the spotlight with Semrush. Get all the SEO, SMM, and market analysis tools you need to get noticed online.

main.title: Spotlight On… You! Make Your Business Visible Online!
main.subtitle:
Manage your SEO, social media, content, and competitive
research all on one convenient platform. Create a winning
strategy and watch your growth shoot to the stars.

text-pic.title:
How Semrush helps
businesses big and small
text-pic.text-1:
Improve your site health and implement an SEO
strategy that makes you stand out. Rank high to
increase your sales.
text-pic.subtitle-2:
Expand your
audience, not your
budget
text-pic.text-2: Make data-driven marketing decisions to efficiently manage your budget and invest in channels that bring the most growth.
text-pic.text-3:
Reveal your top competitors and spot any changes in
their market share over time. Benchmark your own
market position against your rivals.

reasons.title: Why Semrush?
reasons.text-1: With an easy-to-use interface, get into the data right away.
reasons.text-2: Do SEO, content marketing, advertising, market research, and social media all on one convenient platform.
reasons.text-3: Rest assured that your online marketing is always on task, even when you’re playing a different role.
reasons.text-4: From global analysis to ZIP code tracking, gain in-depth insights into what drives consumers so you can stay ahead of the competition.
reasons.text-5: Make business decisions confidently with access to 20B keywords, 43T backlinks, 25B URLs crawled per day, 500TB of raw data, and more.

cta-screen.title: Don’t wait in the wings—grab the spotlight today with Semrush
